flavor_text_entries.x-y:
Striking opponents over and over
makes the user’s fists harder.
Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user charges at the target and may make
it flinch.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user charges at the target and may make
it flinch.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user charges at the target and may make
it flinch.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target.
If the user’s previous move has failed, the power
of this move doubles.
